name: tm22
effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Absorbs sunlight in
the 1st turn, then
attacks next turn.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Absorbs sunlight in
the 1st turn, then
attacks next turn.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A 2-turn move that
blasts the foe with
absorbed energy in
the 2nd turn.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam on
the second turn.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon
to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing
Pokémon flinch.
